mapper.sql: id, class_id, student_id, status, created, modified
mapper.insert: insert into t_class_student (id, class_id, student_id, status, created, modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{studentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select cs.id, c.id class_id from t_class c join t_class_student cs on c.id = cs.class_id where c.teacher_id = #{id}
